## Vectors in R

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow", TRUE)

# if items in vectors are different classes, it'll categorize it as one common type
class(marmots) 
```

Create a numeric vector

```{r}
# numeric values
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.9, 5)

class(pika)
```

```{r}
# integer values
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L)
```
